turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: How you doin', old boy?

turns.speaker: BLAIR
turns.text: I don't know who to trust.

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Know what you mean, Blair.  Trust is a tough thing to come by these days. Just trust in the Lord.

turns.speaker: BLAIR
turns.text: Watch Clark.

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: What?

turns.speaker: BLAIR
turns.text: Watch him close.  Ask him why he didn't kennel the dog.

turns.speaker: BLAIR
turns.text: I've changed my mind... I'd... I'd like to come back inside... I don't want to stay out here any more... Funny things... I hear funny things out here.

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Have you come across Fuchs?

turns.speaker: BLAIR
turns.text: Fuchs...?  No, it's not Fuchs... You must let me back in... I won't harm anyone... I promise...

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: We'll see...

turns.speaker: PALMER
turns.text: Happens all the time, man.  They're falling out of the skies like flies. Government knows all about it... Chariots of the Gods, man... They practically own South America.  I mean they taught the Incas everything they knew...

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: Cool it, Palmer!!

turns.speaker: PALMER
turns.text: Childs, where's that magneto from Chopper One?

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: Ain't it there?

turns.speaker: PALMER
turns.text: What?

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: Don't walk behind me.

turns.speaker: PALMER
turns.text: Auxiliary light cables...?  Been cut.

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: Cut, bullshit.  Been pulled apart.

turns.speaker: PALMER
turns.text: Somebody broke in.

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: Now who'd go and do...

turns.speaker: PALMER
turns.text: Childs!!

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: Let go of me...

turns.speaker: PALMER
turns.text: Don't get near 'em.  The plants! They're alive.  Those things can imitate anything...

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: What's it going to do, being a plant?

turns.speaker: PALMER
turns.text: We got to burn 'em.

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: Now hold on, you dumb...

turns.speaker: PALMER
turns.text: Why didn't it imitate Fuchs?  Isn't that its number -- to get more recruits.

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: Wasn't enough time.  Generator was out, what...?  Thirty minutes. Takes the bastards an hour, maybe two to absorb somebody.

turns.speaker: PALMER
turns.text: Could have been anytime.  Anywhere.

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: If it did get to him.

turns.speaker: PALMER
turns.text: Let's open it.

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: Hell no.

turns.speaker: PALMER
turns.text: Let's open it.  Now...

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: Why you so damn anxious to let him in here...

turns.speaker: PALMER
turns.text: He's so close.  Maybe our best chance to blow him away.

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: No.  Just let him freeze out there.

turns.speaker: GARRY
turns.text: You catch anything he was saying?

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: Am I starting to look Norwegian to you, Bwana?

turns.speaker: GARRY
turns.text: I suppose... well, it's possible someone might have lifted it from me.  But...

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: That key ring of yours is always hooked to your belt.  Now how could somebody get to it without you knowing?

turns.speaker: GARRY
turns.text: Look, I haven't been near that... that refrigerator.

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: I said where?  Where'd you go?!

turns.speaker: GARRY
turns.text: Was dark... find a light...

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: You lying bastard...

turns.speaker: NAULS
turns.text: Lighten your load, sucker.  You ain't the judge and executioner around here!

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: Who you trying to protect, mutherfucker?  I'm telling you this S.O.B. could be one of them.

turns.speaker: NAULS
turns.text: Childs!  That a fuse?

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: No.  The generator.  You got the auxiliary box just off the kitchen. Get to it.  Where's the damn flashlight?  You fellas okay over there?

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: Cut that out, Copper.  Nauls?  What's taking you?!

turns.speaker: NAULS
turns.text: I'm working it!  Nothing's happening!

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: That's impossible, man!  Okay, Clark, out of the john where I can see you!

turns.speaker: NAULS
turns.text: It's shorted out or something!

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: Clark, you come on out here!!

turns.speaker: NAULS
turns.text: Somebody's taken it.  I can't find it!

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: Clark, you want me to come in after you?!

turns.speaker: NAULS
turns.text: Cut him loose of the line up by his shack.

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: Cut him loose?

turns.speaker: NAULS
turns.text: When we were up poking around his place... I found this...

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: What's happening?

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Childs, you got the torch?  You get your ass in here!!

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Torch it over there!

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: The dogs?

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Screw the dogs!!  Torch it!!

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: MacReady!

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Look, I'm just guessing...

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: Well, go on.

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: ... So it crashes, and this guy, whoever he is, gets thrown out, or walks out, and ends up freezing.

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: I just can't believe this voodoo bullshit.  You believe this voodoo bullshit, Blair?

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Yeah, they dig him up and cart him back.  He gets thawed out, wakes up and scares the shit out of them. And they get into one hell of a brawl...

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: Now how's this motherfucker wake up after thousands of years in the ice, huh?

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: I don't know how.  Because he's different than we are.  Because he's a space guy.  What do you want from me, anyway.  Go ask Blair.

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: You buy any of this, Blair?

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: I can get maybe another five or six feet out of it.

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: That's good enough.

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: Where's the other half?

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Probably the next meal.

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: What we going to do?!

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: How the fuck do I know?!

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Torch them!!

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: But...

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: He's gone already!  Do it!

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: What do we do about those three?

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: We got morphine, don't we.

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: MacReady!

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: What?

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: Garry's missing!

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Oh, shit!  Well, hang on!

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: Gee, thanks!

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: Well, who says I want you going with me?!

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Cut the bullshit... Okay, Sanchez, you come with us.  Norris... you stay here...  Any of them move -- you fry 'em. And if you hear anything, anything at all you let loose the siren.  We all meet back here in twenty minutes regardless.  And everybody watch whoever you're with.  Real close.

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: ... Nothing human could have made it back here in this weather without a guideline...

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: ... Where is everybody?!  I'm half frostbit!

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: What are you doing?

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: You're a dead man, MacReady -- or a dead whatever the hell you are!

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: We found your clothes -- the ones you tried to burn.

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: What clothes?

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: You been made, MacReady.

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: ... Ever occur to the jury that anybody could have gotten to some of my clothes and stuck them up...

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: We ain't buying that.

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Palmer, you and Copper tie everyone down.  Real tight.

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: What for?

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: For your health.

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: You ain't tying me up.

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Then I'll have to kill you.

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: Then kill me.

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: We should have jumped his ass.

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Now Copper, you tie Palmer up.

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: Load of bullshit.

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: We'll see.  Let's try Clark.

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: Spaceship of some kind.

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Smart S.O.B.  He put it together piece by piece.

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: I think so.

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: What do you mean "you think so?"

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Not the only one.

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: The fire's got the temperature way up all over camp... won't last long though.

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Neither will we.

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: Maybe we should try and fix the radio... try and get some help.

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Maybe we shouldn't.

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: Then we'll never make it.

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Maybe we shouldn't make it.

turns.speaker: CHILDS
turns.text: If you're worried about anything, let's take that blood test of yours.

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: If we've got any surprises for each other -- we shouldn't be in any condition to do anything about it.  You play chess?

turns.speaker: DR. COPPER
turns.text: Screw regulations!  Four guys could be crawling around on their bellies out there!

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: So, I don't want to end up crawling around with them when we go down.

turns.speaker: DR. COPPER
turns.text: My God, what in hell happened here?

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Come on, Copper.

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Hey, Sweden!!!

turns.speaker: DR. COPPER
turns.text: They're not Swedish, goddamn it, they're Norwegian, MacRe --

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Anything?

turns.speaker: DR. COPPER
turns.text: All in Norwegian.

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: What are you doing?

turns.speaker: DR. COPPER
turns.text: Could be important work.  Might as well bring it back.

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: It's getting late.  Hurry it.  I'm going to check the last few rooms.

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Well, who's got access to it?

turns.speaker: DR. COPPER
turns.text: I guess I'm the only one.

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Would that test have worked?

turns.speaker: DR. COPPER
turns.text: I think so.

turns.speaker: DR. COPPER
turns.text: Now hold him.

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: I'm a real light sleeper, Childs...

turns.speaker: DR. COPPER
turns.text: Enough, MacReady!

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: And if anyone tries to wake me...

turns.speaker: DR. COPPER
turns.text: Damn you, MacReady!

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: I guess you're okay.

turns.speaker: DR. COPPER
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Didn't think you'd use that fibrillator on Norris if you were one of them.

turns.speaker: DR. COPPER
turns.text: ... Guys as crazy as that could have done a lot of damage to their own before they got to us.

turns.speaker: GARRY
turns.text: Nothing we can do about that.

turns.speaker: DR. COPPER
turns.text: Yes, there is.  I'd like to go up.

turns.speaker: GARRY
turns.text: In this weather?

turns.speaker: DR. COPPER
turns.text: Bennings?

turns.speaker: DR. COPPER
turns.text: Goes on like that quite awhile.  What do you gentlemen make of it?

turns.speaker: GARRY
turns.text: Could be anything... Men in isolation... some beef that snowballed... got out of hand...

turns.speaker: GARRY
turns.text: Hold on, damn it.  We're getting nowhere... If this bit of Blair's about absorbing and imitating is true... then that dog could have gotten to anybody.

turns.speaker: DR. COPPER
turns.text: And if it got to Clark... Clark could have gotten to anybody.

turns.speaker: GARRY
turns.text: How long will it take you to prepare this?

turns.speaker: DR. COPPER
turns.text: A couple of hours.

turns.speaker: GARRY
turns.text: Well, get to it.

turns.speaker: NORRIS
turns.text: Can there be... some kind of test? To find out who's what?

turns.speaker: DR. COPPER
turns.text: A serum test possibly.

turns.speaker: DR. COPPER
turns.text: I don't see how... when I'm finished I return it right away.

turns.speaker: NORRIS
turns.text: When was the last time you used it?

turns.speaker: DR. COPPER
turns.text: A day or so ago... I guess.

turns.speaker: DR. COPPER
turns.text: I'm getting worried about you.  You ought to have a checkup.

turns.speaker: NORRIS
turns.text: Let's just not get worried about anything just now.

turns.speaker: DR. COPPER
turns.text: After all this mess then.

turns.speaker: NORRIS
turns.text: After all this mess.

turns.speaker: FUCHS
turns.text: Gotta be from the Norwegian camp.

turns.speaker: GARRY
turns.text: How far's that?

turns.speaker: FUCHS
turns.text: 'Bout eighty kilos southwest.

turns.speaker: GARRY
turns.text: That far?

turns.speaker: GARRY
turns.text: How many in their party?

turns.speaker: FUCHS
turns.text: Started with six.  There'd be four others left.

turns.speaker: FUCHS
turns.text: Right.  Why not?

turns.speaker: GARRY
turns.text: What's that?

turns.speaker: SANCHEZ
turns.text: Hey, man...!

turns.speaker: GARRY
turns.text: You reach anybody yet?

turns.speaker: SANCHEZ
turns.text: We're a thousand miles from anybody else, man.  It's going to get a hell of a lot worse before it gets better.

turns.speaker: GARRY
turns.text: Well, stick to it.

turns.speaker: SANCHEZ
turns.text: Couple seconds of an Argentine disco station.

turns.speaker: GARRY
turns.text: Well, stick with it.  I want you at it round the clock.  We got to get help in here...

turns.speaker: GARRY
turns.text: Put that down!

turns.speaker: SANCHEZ
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: GARRY
turns.text: I'll put this right through your head.

turns.speaker: GARRY
turns.text: Look, if you're going to keep bitching, MacReady -- Palmer's offered to take him up...

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: What are you talking?!  He's had two months training in those choppers!

turns.speaker: GARRY
turns.text: We're on fire!

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Don't let up, Childs!

turns.speaker: GARRY
turns.text: Extinguishers.

turns.speaker: GARRY
turns.text: You're not thinking of going after them, are you?

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: I am going after them.

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Get these things out of supply and meet me over by the snowmobiles.

turns.speaker: GARRY
turns.text: You're not going to catch them in one of those with the start they got.

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Palmer, how long would it take you to strap those big four-cylinder carburetors on?

turns.speaker: GARRY
turns.text: Ah... no one... I give it to Copper when he needs it...

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Could anyone have gotten it from you?

turns.speaker: GARRY
turns.text: Let's rush him.  He's not going to blow us all up.

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Damn if I won't.

turns.speaker: GARRY
turns.text: Pure nonsense.  This won't prove a damn thing.

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Thought you'd feel that way, Garry. You were the only one who could have gotten to that blood plasma...  ... we'll do you last...

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Looks good.

turns.speaker: GARRY
turns.text: One thousand volts.  Should be enough.

turns.speaker: GARRY
turns.text: How long's it been?

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Little over two hours.

turns.speaker: PALMER
turns.text: Four!

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: What is it out there, anyway? Forty-five knots?

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: What's...

turns.speaker: PALMER
turns.text: Blair.  He's gone berserk.

turns.speaker: PALMER
turns.text: Oh, I got you.  Not too long.

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Then get a move on.  Childs, come with me.

turns.speaker: PALMER
turns.text: How's that Thing get to the dogs?  I though we stopped it in time.

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Copper thinks they swallowed pieces of it during the fight.

turns.speaker: PALMER
turns.text: And that was enough?

turns.speaker: PALMER
turns.text: No it ain't there.  Would I be asking if it were there?

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Move it, Palmer.

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Sanchez...?  Hey, who...

turns.speaker: PALMER
turns.text: Mac, where the hell is that pump!!

turns.speaker: PALMER
turns.text: Somebody definitely messed with it.

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: We going to make it?

turns.speaker: PALMER
turns.text: Hope so.  Another ten, fifteen minutes.  What I don't get is...

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Sanchez, you and Palmer search the inside...

turns.speaker: PALMER
turns.text: I ain't going with Sanchez.

turns.speaker: PALMER
turns.text: What kind of test?

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: I'm sure a lot of you already know.

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Tie up Clark, too.

turns.speaker: PALMER
turns.text: He's dead.

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Norris looked pretty dead, himself. Bullets don't kill these Things.

turns.speaker: SANCHEZ
turns.text: How we going to try and find out who's... you know, who's who?

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Can you think of any other tests?

turns.speaker: SANCHEZ
turns.text: Where were the flashlights?

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Screw the flashlights.  Where the hell were you?

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: We've got to find Fuchs.  When we find him -- we kill him.

turns.speaker: SANCHEZ
turns.text: Why?

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: If he's one of those Things, we've got to get to him before he changes... Nauls, you and Childs and I'll check the outside shacks...

turns.speaker: SANCHEZ
turns.text: What if it doesn't come?

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: It'll come.  It needs us.  We're the only thing left to imitate...  Give me a hand.

turns.speaker: SANCHEZ
turns.text: He might just wait us out.

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: I'm going to blow the generator when you get back.  He'll have to come for us -- or freeze.

turns.speaker: NAULS
turns.text: That thing's too smart to be hiding any more of its clothes, MacReady.

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Just keep looking.

turns.speaker: NAULS
turns.text: This storm do that?

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Couldn't be possible.  Must have weighted a ton and a half...

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: ... Hey, somebody!  Open up, it's me, MacReady...  ... Come on, damn it... The towline snapped.  Been crawling around like a seal out here...

turns.speaker: NAULS
turns.text: Bullshit!  He's got to know damn well I cut it!

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: We're going to draw a little bit of everybody's blood.

turns.speaker: NAULS
turns.text: What are you going to do?  Drink it?

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Watching Norris in there... gave me the idea that maybe every part of you bastards is a whole.  Every piece of you is self-sufficient, an animal unto itself.  When a man bleeds it's just tissue.  But blood from one of you Things won't obey. It's a newly formed individual with a built-in desire to protect its own life.  When attacked, your blood will try and survive -- and crawl away from a hot needle say.

turns.speaker: NAULS
turns.text: What is it?

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Everything that's been missing.

turns.speaker: NAULS
turns.text: Where was he trying to go?

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Anyplace but here.

turns.speaker: NAULS
turns.text: What about Childs?

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Forget about Childs.  He's over.

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: You and Nauls got to block off the west side bunks, the mess hall and the kitchen.

turns.speaker: NAULS
turns.text: You crazy?  He might be inside already?

turns.speaker: MACREADY
turns.text: Chance we got to take.  We got to force him to come down the east side to the door we got rigged.
